dt: {bc}a plump, white-bearded, red-suited, and jolly old man in modern folklore who delivers presents to children at Christmastime

dt.t: There might be a few weeks left until Christmas, but {wi}Santa Claus{/wi} and his merry elves landed early in Bakersfield because several boys and girls on the nice list caught their attention.

… we had dashed downstairs to the living room to see what {wi}Santa{/wi} had brought and piled up, in great mounds of splendidly wrapped packages, under the Christmas tree—whose angel's halo brushed the ceiling.

et: modification of Dutch {it}Sinterklaas{/it}, alteration of {it}Sint Nikolaas{/it} Saint Nicholas
